Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    this class implements a Company data access object to perform operations with objects and database Receives data from the database to the user || write data received from the user to the database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    monder
